name: Tank Inc.
description:
Welcome to Tank Inc, a game about blowing up tanks. Wow, who saw that one coming?

Upgrade your tank and purchase ammo to help you defend your headquarters from the endless waves of enemy tanks. Play a choice of modes including single and co-op wave-defences, 2-4 player deathmatch, and 2-4 player capture the flag. Supports keyboard and gamepad controls.
